mainText:
Just home from work, wake up my iMac, and the news of Steve's death 
greets me on the New York Times main page.

Flip on MSNBC and the tributes are already running.  I am stunned and 
greatly saddened.  It feels like a death in the family.

What an incomparable person he was. What a life he had.  What a 
legacy he leaves!
author: Lindsay
